description: A pair of tactical gloves.  Relatively-thin and with numerous changes made to ensure maximum hand and trigger finger dexterity, the Specialty gloves are designed primarily for military and law-enforcement use.  The outer side of the glove is made of a breathable material, ensuring comfort during prolonged wear.  The inner side is made of faux leather, with the goal of improving firearm handling.
